Title: The Last Gingerbread House on the Left
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Nora Smith
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: Bob gets involved in a gingerbread house competition with Mr. Fischoeder and his friends while Linda, Teddy and the kids spread Christmas cheer through caroling.
